name: Desktop Toy - Tires
description:
Today is the 21st of december 2021! What a day! I am releasing this little gizmo after a cool evening of coding and fun!

Shouts out to codemonkey, amazing code for making desktop toy code actually work! So basically, it's a transparent window that lets you click through it, so when you arent interacting WITH the toy, you can work, code, do whatever. 

But here's the crazy thing about it, literally anything possible in a videogame, can be put onto the desktop, the possibilities are endless for development.

However, this is just a toy of little bouncy tires, enjoy, i hope y'all check out codemonkey and make your own desktop toys, they went away in the 90s, they need to come back because they are fun to make and to use!
